Class SlotDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.dao.SlotDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SlotDAO
public class SlotDAOImpl extends Object implements SlotDAO
MySQL-based implementation of the SlotDAO interface. Uses JDBC to perform CRUD operations on gym slot data.
Author:
team IOTA
